title: Science
content:
The intellectual and practical activity encompassing the systematic study of the structure and behavior of the physical and natural world through observation and experiment.

  • Flat Earth theory
  • HAARP weather control
  • Global warming as a hoax
  • UFOs and alien visitations
  • Area 51 and secret government experiments
  • The Philadelphia Experiment
  • The Montauk Project
  • Ancient astronauts and the role of extraterrestrials in human history
  • Nikola Tesla's suppressed inventions
  • The suppression of free energy technologies
  • The Tunguska event
  • The Dyatlov Pass incident
  • The Black Knight satellite
